title: veera urudhi
sahitya:
vIra urudi taruvAi parAshakti veTri mighat-taruvAi



anupallavi



pArellAm unnaruL paNgaL mozhiyavE pOr sheyyum manamIp-poigaL

ozhiyavE  



caraNam 1



enadiyAn engira irumAppu naliyavE manaitorum podu nala vinai nalam poliyavE



caraNam 2



tAyirni shEyillai taraiyinri payirillai nIyinri yAmillai ninnai

piriyAda



caraNam 3



dEshamum nIyE en deivamum nIyE pAshamum nIyE engaL bandhanai

shindiDa
